title: Thanks
body:
Thanks a lot, Fred. I'm glad you were able to help us out. I'll let you have one of the pocket dimensions, designated 'Runic Dungeon' if you'd like.
	Other than that, we're going to make much more progress than we thought. We should be able to finish just after the deadline, perhaps earlier if all goes well. I'll inform Command.
	Thanks again, old friend. - Baker
